sentences.sContent: Indeed, pain itself is an illusion, a phantom in the brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Indeed, pain itself is an illusion, a phantom in the brain.
sentences.sCn: 实际上疼痛本身就是一个幻觉，一个脑中的幽灵。

synos.tran: 幽灵的；[心理]幻觉的；有名无实的

remMethod.val: phan(显现) + tom → 显现的东西 → 幽灵

words.tran: 幻影似的；变幻不定的；幻想的；幽灵的

trans.tranOther: something that exists only in your imagination
